Text.Value: I've cancelled the rite. The circle must heal.
Leave.
Halsin's cancelled the rite. The brood is exposed. And we've you to thank, Silvanus have pity.
Attack.
Enough of the act. I've learned of your alliance with Shadow Druids.

EditorData.logicalname: Player discovers Shadow Druid plans after AOD.

Text.Value: Safe. For now.
Have you now? And you thought you should tell me?
Safe. For now.
This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.

EditorData.logicalname: Halsin saved + died since - kagha not exposed

Text.Value: With Halsin back, at least the grove might stand a chance. And we've you to thank.
If only Halsin were still here to guide us. Silvanus willing, we might heal without him.
This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.

EditorData.logicalname: Halsin still missing - Sagha not exposed

Text.Value: This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.

EditorData.logicalname: Halsin dead in goblin camp, Kagha still bad

Text.Value: Silvanus willing, we might heal before then.
We will execute the Rite of Thorns, and you will give no more complaint. In fact...
...you will be gone before the sun next sets on the grove.
This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.

EditorData.logicalname: Halsin saved + died since - Kagha repented

Text.Value: This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.

EditorData.logicalname: Halsin dead in goblin camp, Kagha repented

Text.Value: As you will. I'll go in peace.
But I won't sacrifice our future to the screaming horde. While I still breathe, this grove will not come to harm.
This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.
This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.
This is only the beginning. An army soon crosses the coast.

Synopsis: Kagha dialogue if Attack on Den has occurred. Various states included in this dialogue
